category.name: NX
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_NX_Navigator_Override_NX_Load_Option
preference.preference_description: Determines which configuration to load when an assembly is opened in Teamcenter Integration for NX from rich client. Its defined values are referenced only when an assembly is opened from My Teamcenter; assemblies opened from Structure Manager obey the revision rules set in Structure Manager. Valid Values: As Saved - Loads the part file as it was saved in Teamcenter Integration for NX. Latest - Loads the part file with the latest revision rule. None - Ignores the As Saved command and loads the assembly as defined in the load_options.def file.
